com.DizWARE.ShuffleTone
Class FileBrowser

java.lang.Object
  ListActivity
      com.DizWARE.ShuffleTone.FileBrowser
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class FileBrowser
extends ListActivity
implements java.lang.Runnable

This class is the User Interface for the file browser. Handles the list of files on the users card, and the files that they save into their current playlist

Author:
Tydiz
